description: This trail is around Mt Rundle. Very interesting, The only difficult part is when getting close to Canmore close to the nordic centre, there is a huge climb towards Whitemans Pond. The most interesting segment is after the pond, the trails is a bit downhill and gets very fast.
directions: Not complicated: just park there and follow the trail !N51.16976 W115.51198
title: Around Mt Rundle
